article.Heading: Altered divestment strategy will be finalised shortly: Jaitley
article.Summary: Finance minister Arun Jaitley believes the gold monetisation scheme will find acceptance and he is not worried about it. Meanwhile, he also adds that an altered divestment strategy will be finalised shortly. He also feels that banks will need to take tough steps to recover dues
article.Body:
Finance minister Arun Jaitley believes the gold monetisation scheme will find acceptance and he is not worried about it. Meanwhile, he also adds that an altered divestment strategy will be finalised shortly. He also feels that banks will need to take tough steps to recover dues.

Watch video for more....
